lender.name: Benoît
lender.loan_because: I believe in changing the world through entrepreneurship, and I want to help others do it.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I believe people want to better themselves, and I want to help in my small way. This is a picture of my granddaughter. I loan because I want her world to be a better place to live!
lender.occupational_info: I edit textbooks for students learning about how to spend government money in a responsible way.

lender.name: Mary & Michael
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to help others, but not by simply giving them things. We want to make opportunities for people to help themselves. We also hope to own a business one day. We hope that putting this good energy out into the world it will come back to us and, when it is time for us to ask for a loan, we will get the help we need.
lender.occupational_info: We both work in an office supporting the structure of a medium sized business so that it can grow.

lender.name: Jeannette
lender.loan_because: Statistics show that by helping women economically, women who do well, begin to focus on building community, building education systems and bettering the lives of children in their communities and villages.
lender.occupational_info: Executive Director of www.peacejourney.com. Through Kiva we are working to focus our giving to women to make substantial changes in their economic lives,. Next step: plan to personally meet the women we support along with groups of adults and children from the USA by traveling to their region, building computer labs, and helping with cultural education programs.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: it's important to pay the rent while we're here on this planet. This is a good way to pay the rent.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I want to give to people less fortunate than myself, what better way to do it?
lender.occupational_info: i'm currently a high school student.

lender.name: Dusty
lender.loan_because: What a great concept. Less privileged people can make a cheaper loan request – pay back when they can – and I feel great reinvesting all over again – works for me
lender.occupational_info: After 11 years working on-road in Perth metro as a Paramedic, I now have the peace and comfort of working in a totally different environment within the mining industry located in the North West Pilbara region of Western Australia. I now look forward to work each day.

lender.name: gary
lender.loan_because: I want to try to make a difference.

lender.name: Curt Welch
lender.loan_because: I enjoy being able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I run my own small web business as well as making money as a blacksmith.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: I have a family, home and job I love and I am happy to loan to others to help them achieve that too.
lender.occupational_info: I have 400 students ages 5-11 who come to my library each week to choose books to borrow. I read to them and encourage them to read

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I have no reason to acquire things. Fueling someones' hopes and dreams is fulfilling and all I need. It all makes the globe seem smaller
lender.occupational_info: Coffee Wholesaler

lender.name: Shay
lender.loan_because: It is ones moral duty to help another who is less fortunate than oneself.

lender.name: Elizabeth, Mark & Quinn
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference.

lender.name: claire
lender.loan_because: It's good to be in a place where I can help someone who needs help.
lender.occupational_info: I help people cope with life.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I believe we must reach out and help all of our brothers and sisters around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a global manufacturer of mining and construction equipment

lender.name: chelsea
lender.loan_because: i a good person
lender.occupational_info: hard and boreding

lender.name: SueZ
lender.occupation: Everything nobody else wants to do
lender.loan_because: it's about time somebody else had the same opportunities that I did.
lender.occupational_info: Too much work, too little time.

lender.name: steve & midge
lender.loan_because: we both feel that everyone is here on this planet to help one another. We all have some resource, be it time, talent, money, to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Steve is a dentist who really loves to make people feel good about themselves. He also works with patients who are experiencing sleep problems such as apnea. I am a dental hygienist who loves to educate patients about preventing problems with their teeth and gums. I like working with people who are ready to help themselves get healthy and keep their teeth for a lifetime.

lender.name: Marisa
lender.loan_because: I believe in having a positive impact on the global community. As one person, I can only do so much; however, collectively, we as a whole can make a difference. I believe in giving people the opportunity to succeed.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: My first loan is a gift in honor of my mother, Shirley Baird, who has inspired me to try and give back to the world by her own generous and caring example in her community and with her family and friends. And she believes in helping people to help themselves....

lender.name: Damon
lender.loan_because: Share the wealth baby!!
lender.occupational_info: My job = Screaming around perth on a Honda CT110. oh and i also deliver mail ;-)

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to be successful, realize their potential, and make their dreams a reality.

lender.name: Jet
lender.loan_because: I am always looking for ways to give back and kiva offers me a great way to pass on the abundant monetary blessings that I have recieved.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist. My job is to design rooms so they can make a person happy and comfortable.

lender.name: Brit
lender.loan_because: my (very cool) aunt kim gave me a gift card for xmas and I am thrilled with this program.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student police officer for my University (college). I like to ensure that the students and staff are safe while they teach/attend this school.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Sacred Haven Coven
lender.loan_because: We care. We have compassion. We believe in the power of empowerment.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of women who are walking a spiritual path together.

lender.name: AARON
lender.loan_because: im spreading gods love

lender.name: Cathleen
lender.loan_because: It is a small world. We are more closely connected than we realize. Helping someone far away helps us all and makes the world a better place.

lender.name: Jasson
lender.occupational_info: Travel Addict, Designer, Photographer, Intermittent Mad Scientist, and a Former Googler, YouTuber, and Farmer who's now going to Grad School at Domus Academy in Italy.

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women accomplish their goals.

lender.name: Priya
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance at success

lender.name: MICHAEL
lender.loan_because: we want to help people in other countries be self-sufficient. We also want people to know that Americans care about others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in municipal government in Bowling Green, Kentucky, a city of 56,000 people.

lender.name: Jill & Dennis
lender.loan_because: in my travels I see people trying very hard to make a living and I want to help. By loaning money instead of giving it, I can help more people.
lender.occupational_info: I find out what products people need to help them . Then I work with a team that invents the product. Once it is manufactured I present the product to those that might want to purchase it.

lender.name: Paco
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: As a writer and filmmaker, my work is derived from my imagination. When not working, I imagine how much better this world could be.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Leanna
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because:
My boyfriend introduced me to Kiva and I thought it was the best thing he's ever done. I love the idea of helping people who truly need money in an entrepreneurial, responsible way. I also love the fact that once a loan gets paid back, I can re-invest it towards someone else. The reach just keeps growing.
It makes me feel like the world is moving towards a sustainable direction instead of creating more gaps.
Thank you, Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I work for an online media company. Basically instead of putting advertising on magazines and newspaper, I place them on independent websites to help them make a living out of their passion.

lender.name: Yifei
lender.loan_because: We are all connected.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of public policy and international management. I hope to one day manage projects like this one that impact the lives of so many.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower people around the world to improve their living situations and livelihoods.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying for my master's in International Education Policy. I aspire to pursue a career in international development and/or philanthropy.

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: life is too short to be selfish

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I hope the spirit of goodwill in which the loans are made will have a ripple effect to those who receive them and improve entire communities
lender.occupational_info: I operate a machine that manufactures cardboard cartons. I am fortunate to do this in a clean, modern and safe factory.

lender.name: Kjersti
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help, and I find it very interesting and inspiring to see exactly who I loan money to, and what they are needed for.
lender.occupational_info: I study sociology at the university. I am writing my master thesis now.

lender.name: Patric Blixt
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Helping people talk to their loved ones...

lender.name: GiGaGo.nl
lender.loan_because: Alle donaties van bezoekers aan onze website worden uitgeleend. Zo helpen we samen mensen een bestaan op te bouwen.
lender.occupational_info: Al ruim 40 leningen !

lender.name: Nico
lender.loan_because: it's great to be able to select who to lend to.
lender.occupational_info: trying to make the world a better place, especially using IT and new media.

lender.name: Simon & Enid
lender.loan_because: I was given a gift of a loan for Christmas
lender.occupational_info: Hard worker who wants to help others.

lender.name: Rose, Milo & family
lender.loan_because: We want people to be able to get ahead in life enabling a better life for them and importantly, education for their children.

lender.name: Rajesh
lender.loan_because: micro financing provides tangible assistance to build a framework for sustainable enterprise
lender.occupational_info: philanthropic

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an equal chance
lender.occupational_info: I create websites

lender.name: Evelyn
lender.loan_because: I have just enough, so I can share.

lender.name: Bengt-Olov
lender.occupation: MD and Founder of Logosol AB

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering others to accomplish their goals and to aid in abolishing poverty around the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I'm the owner of a retail parrot pet store where I breed and hand raise wonderful parrots for others as life long companions & sell parrot supplies.

lender.name: Marty & Bob
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: We do several things: part time teacher in adult education while we also run a contracting business, specialty insulation systems & energy consultations.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: a small amount of money to me can make a world of difference to someone else. These loans empower people to build more secure lives for themselves, their families, their communities, and perhaps even for me.
lender.occupational_info: I help develop training classes for lawyers so they have the skills and knowledge to grow in their careers.

lender.name: JMW
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in people's lives. Small businesses empower people and benefit families and communities.

lender.name: Ella
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in need!
lender.occupational_info: I go to school to learn things.

lender.name: Lorne
lender.loan_because:
As an entrepreneur I have been very fortunate and feel it is my responsibility to help other entrepreneurs who do not have access to traditional forms of credit.
As a master's student in community economic development I have a very strong interest in microloans and building community capacity through skill development and education.

lender.name: The Girls of Sears Hall at VVS
Bruce & Marilyn
lender.loan_because: "We are all in the same boat, in a stormy sea, and we owe each other a terrible loyalty." G. K. Chesterton

lender.name: Corlette
lender.loan_because: This is a great program. I welcome the chance to help in some small way.
lender.occupational_info: retired nurse

lender.name: Tamara
lender.loan_because: I want to help people reach their dreams of being a business owner.

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: Life's been good to me. Throughout my life, kindnesses have appeared in the most unexpected ways. I'd like to share that experience with others.
lender.occupational_info: I write like a demon.

lender.name: Milica
lender.occupation: Personal trainer, Milates & Kundalini yoga treache

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of living in a world where distance doesn't limit the people we meet and support. I experienced encouragement and support when I started my business and I want to pass that on.
lender.occupational_info: My company manufactures artwork for hospitals and nursing homes making these places a little more pleasant and comfortable for peole who have to be there.

lender.name: Jayanti
lender.occupation: graduate student in demography and sociology

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Allie
lender.loan_because: all creation exists to share!

lender.name: Marit & Daan
lender.loan_because: it's an easy way helping people who really need it

lender.name: Brian Brown
lender.occupation: Voice Actor by night. Network Monkey by day.
lender.loan_because: I can and so can you.

lender.name: Meri and Michael
lender.occupational_info: Michael teaches English and Meri teaches babies.

lender.name: TEPFC Jenkins
lender.loan_because: We Care

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I organize Sunday School classes and plan fun activities that help children learn and live their faith.

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.loan_because: Hand up beats a hand out and the fact that such small amounts can mean a viable business that supports families. It just makes sense.
lender.occupational_info: Own and operate Brain balance of Charlotte, an achievement center for children with neurobehavioral disorders like AD/HD, learning disorders, asperger's/autism, tourette's etc.

lender.name: Håkan
lender.loan_because: Why n´t

lender.name: Kyle J. Warnica
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I have the ability to
lender.occupational_info: soon to be acupuncturist which is the art of sticking needles in the body to help people with ailments.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: This is my first loan, and I am really interested to see how the microloan process works. My Uncle Jim gave me $50.00 to loan as a Christmas gift.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small animal veterinary hospital in Columbus, OH. My job includes taking good care of the people that own pets and the pets themselves. I help educate people about how to best take care of their pets, help the veterinarian with preventative medical care (vaccine, dental care, ) and prepare animals for surgery, and perform dental cleanings for dogs and cats.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: It is so cliched - but those of us who have, need to assist those of us who have not...I have been very lucky in my life to always be one of the haves....and it is time to share
lender.occupational_info: I am a project manager in the office/hospitality industry working on projects from 5 offices to over 500!!! Fabric and textiles are still my first love....

lender.name: Jai
lender.loan_because: I believe that the current world banking system is unsustainable and that the concept of interest is unfair. Borrowers are forced to pay back a debt of both principal and interest from a money pool that contains only principal. How can it be that the people who actually produce all the real wealth in the world are in debt to those who merely lend out the money that represents the wealth?
lender.occupational_info: I go to peoples houses to help them with their computers. I fix their computers if they are broken, and I help people better use them for their purposes.

lender.name: Yvette, Sheila & Maggie
lender.loan_because: we're excited about the possibility of directly supporting initiatives on the other side of the planet.
lender.occupational_info: community health

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I think it helps.

lender.name: Ted
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Howard & Kyoko
lender.loan_because: We would hope that in a small way we can help others have a more secure and prosperous life.
lender.occupational_info: We facilitate a professional society of lake managers and educators. The society's purpose is to protect the quality of Michigan's many lakes.

lender.name: jonathon
lender.loan_because: I really enjoy traveling, meeting new people and eating. I hope these people can create something from their dreams and maybe one day I will be fortunate to see it.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the restaurant business.

lender.name: Greta
lender.loan_because: Kiva provides wonderful opportunities to make positive contributions to the world. How could anyone who is able to participate say no?

lender.name: Majikthise
lender.loan_because: Because I can. Sheer birth luck put me in a position where I have more funds than I need for myself - ie living in a rich country - so I see it as my responsibility to help others in a way that preserves both their and my dignity.

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: I'm a member of the world community. I see no divisions among us, and want to help members of my global family.
lender.occupational_info: With our children building their own lives now, I feel drawn to help others around the world....

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: - I loan because I am extremely blessed and feel the need to share these blessings with other people - I loan because my parents had the opportunity to start their own business and I want to give that opportunity to another person. - I loan because women all over the world deserve a chance to acheive their dreams.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: the little bit of spare cash I have left over at the end of the month can make a material difference to someone else's life.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: My good friend gave me a gift certificate
lender.occupational_info: I own a group of restaurants at Seaport Village in San Diego

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: It's amazing the difference one small contribution can make.
lender.occupational_info: I have the honor of working for LISC AmeriCorps this year at the El Cajon Community Development Corporation. Through community education, revitalization projects, and volunteer service work, the El Cajon CDC is improving Downtown El Cajon.

lender.name: Darrell
lender.loan_because: i'm trying to spend more time thinking about other people and less about myself.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an energy company producing oil and natural gas.

lender.name: Jude and Chris
lender.loan_because: It's a small way we can help people we wouldn't otherwise have access to.
lender.occupational_info: Jude writes stories and poetry and also is a clinical social worker. Chris is a lawyer who works mostly with poor people.

lender.name: Daniel and Harriet
lender.loan_because: we want our children to be able to see that tzedakah goes to real people and not just into a box. And it's a smart way to help people.

lender.name: Anders
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: jill
lender.loan_because: I love helping people
lender.occupational_info: Most of my time is spent taking care of our children, writing, teaching, and helping other people be their best, all with God's help.

lender.name: michelle
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed we want to share with the world
lender.occupational_info: happy, healthy and harmonious...

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I believe that women can make a huge difference and often don't get the opportunity. I only loan to women.
lender.occupational_info: Working with senior leaders to better understand gender differences so that they can provide a more inclusive workplace. Working with corporate women to develop skills to support career and personal success.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.occupation: Extension Educator & returned Peace Corp volunteer

lender.name: srihari
lender.occupation: nothing to make a difference to the world

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I'm trying to be the change. My hope is that with each connection the world becomes a little bit smaller and at the same time more friendly, understanding, accepting, forgiving and peaceful.
lender.occupational_info: We provide graphic and printing services.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: as I begin my career in business, I want to help others become successful and provide for their families.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves. I appreciate hard work and effort and want those are willing to work to succeed
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer to make life better for people

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people help themselves.
